item.title: Bike Fit and Maintenance
item.description: Matty Floyd of Affordabike in Charleston performed a bike fit on me. First bike fit I’ve had. It was something I felt I should do at least once so I took the day off to get it done. I can’t remember the last time I took a day off. Matty with the help of the GURU Dynamic Fit Unit made some changes to my fit. Raised my seat post, installed a new stem, adjusted by hoods, etc… I’m sitting allot higher on the Giant Anyroad 1 bicycle now.

item.title: Bike Check and Product Annoyances
item.description:
Shifting was less than stellar during yesterday’s ride. Checked the chain and it is at .75% wear. Time for a replacement.
I see some wear on the cassette as well. I may get that replaced. I will drop off the Giant Anyroad 1 at Mike’s Bikes today.
The Park Cyclone Chain Scrubber works well but the rivets that hold the clips fall out. I’ve lost one rivet. The other one falls out occasionally.
